g.H5704: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
g.H2088: the masculine demonstrative pronoun, this or that
g.H3117: a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an a...
g.H3808: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
g.H8085: to hear intelligently (often with implication of attention, obedience, etc.; causatively, to tell, etc.)
